<L7p:RequireSenderVouchesWithMessageSignature booleanValue="true"/> <L7p:NameFormats stringArrayValue="included"> <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.1:nameid-format:unspecified"/> </L7p:NameFormats> <L7p:RequireHolderOfKeyWithMessageSignature booleanValue="true"/> <L7p:CheckAssertionValidity booleanValue="false"/> <L7p:AttributeStatement samlAttributeInfo="included"> <L7p:Attributes samlAttributeElementInfoArray="included"> <L7p:item samlAttributeElementInfo="included"> <L7p:Value stringValue="value_0"/> <L7p:Namespace stringValue="attributeNameSpace"/> <L7p:Name stringValue="attributeName"/> </L7p:item> </L7p:Attributes> </L7p:AttributeStatement> <L7p:NameQualifier stringValue=""/> <L7p:Version boxedIntegerValue="0"/> </L7p:SamlParams> </wsse:SecurityToken> <L7p:SpecificUser> <L7p:UserLogin stringValue="uid=joe,ou=people,ou=saml-demo,o=example.com"/> <L7p:UserUid stringValue="3735553"/> <L7p:IdentityProviderOid longValue="3702785"/> <L7p:UserName stringValue="uid=joe,ou=people,ou=saml-demo,o=example.com"/> </L7p:SpecificUser> <wsp:MessagePredicate Dialect="http://www.w3.org/TR/1999/REC-xpath-19991116" L7p:variablePrefix="foo" wsp:Usage="wsp:Required" xmlns:ds="http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#" xmlns:ns1="http://warehouse.acme.com/ws" xmlns:saml="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:assertion" xmlns:samlp="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:protocol" xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tns="http://xpathtest/ws" xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">/soapenv:Envelope/soapenv:Header/wsse:Security/*[name()='Assertion']/*[name()='AttributeStatement']/*[name()='Subject']/*[name()='NameIdentifier']</wsp:MessagePredicate> <L7p:ComparisonAssertion> <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="uid=joe,ou=people,ou=saml-demo,o=example.com"/> <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${foo.result}"/> </L7p:ComparisonAssertion> <L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion> <L7p:ProtectedServiceUrl stringValue="http://hugh/ACMEWarehouseWS/Service1.asmx"/> </L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion> </wsp:All> </wsp:Policy>
